title: [Large-Scale] Professional Development Workshops to Enhance Mobile Learning Self-Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital education tool proficiency and elementary mathematics teaching experience
context.additional_context: Participants intensively develop the ability to design and implement math lessons using mobile devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment. The goal is to produce immediately applicable outputs for real classrooms post-course.

learning_goals: Designing math lessons in mobile learning environments to improve self-efficacy by at least 30%
Developing and applying at least one mobile application for math education using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach
Demonstrating the educational effectiveness of mobile learning activities with over 80% satisfaction through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
